QuestData.Title: The Master Siegesmith
QuestData.Description: Not long ago, the most advanced weapon a Thunderlord could make was a really, really big spear. The Blackrock orcs must have shipped in a fearsome master to have them producing cannons so rapidly.$B$BWe need to find that master.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: On loan from the Blackrock Foundry.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Master Siegesmith Uratok in Grom'gar.
QuestData.RewardText: The Iron Horde combines the strengths of every clan. We must continue looking for ways to sever those connections if we hope to defeat them.
